column4: I'm having trouble with rhythmbox.  I can't get it to play songs but all other sounds are working just fine.  Any suggestions?
use mplayer or vlc :)
I want to use rhythmbox
if you play the file from a different player and/or look at the debug output it might give you some hints
How do you do that
run it from the CLI with a verbose option if it's not a menu option (it is in vlc)
What
do you know what a CLI/bash/terminal is?
I know what the terminal is.
sorry missed your answer
Yes I know what the terminal is
What do I need to do?
so if you run the application from terminal you can get more information
How do you do that?
you can type "man rhythmbox" to read the options (hit q to exit)
you can type "man rhythmbox" to read the options (hit q to exit)
rhythmbox -d should stat the app then try playing the file that fails, then put the output in a paste bin
Ok it gave me a bunch of stuff I don't understand.  I did happen to find a few things where it said critical.
put it all here: http://pastebin.com/ and tell me the link
Do you want all of it or just the parts that read failed after them?
Here's the link http://pastebin.com/MEciM3VC
and I'm back I'll read the paste now...
